column2: Having returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] artifact hunt, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] hands you a small ebony box. The relic hunter found a ring of persuasion which will help your diplomatic skills. Will you reward the hunter?

Having returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] artifact hunt, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] hands you a small ebony box. The relic hunter found an amulet of protection which will help protect you from danger. Will you reward the hunter?

Having returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] artifact hunt, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] hands you a small ebony box. The relic hunter found an a potion which will make you stronger. Will you reward the hunter?

Having returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] artifact hunt, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] hands you a small ebony box. The relic hunter found an a potion which will make you faster. Will you reward the hunter?

Having returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] artifact hunt, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] hands you a small ebony box. The relic hunter found an a potion which can heal injuries and afflictions. Will you reward the hunter?

Having returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] artifact hunt, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] hands a long object draped in cloth. The cloth drops to revel a finely forged sword, with ancient runes engraved. A fine weapon. Will you reward the hunter?

Having returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] artifact hunt, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] hands a long object draped in cloth. The cloth drops to revel a finely forged sword. Energy radiates from this powerful weapon. Will you reward the hunter?

Having returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] artifact hunt, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] hands a piece of cloth. Before long, you realise this is a battle standard with powerful magic woven into it. Will you reward the hunter?
Having returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] artifact hunt, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] hands you a small ebony box. The relic hunter found an a magical crown. Will you reward the hunter?

Having returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] artifact hunt, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] hands a long object draped in cloth. The cloth drops to revel a finely forged sword. Energy radiates from this powerful weapon. Will you reward the hunter?

Having returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] artifact hunt, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] hands an old dusty piece of cloth. Dropping it in surprise, you realise that it does not foll to the ground, but remains floating in mid-air. It seems a famed flying carpet has been found! Will you reward the hunter?

Having returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] artifact hunt, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] hands a piece of cloth. Before long, you realise this is a battle standard with powerful magic woven into it. Will you reward the hunter?

Having returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] artifact hunt, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] hands a piece of cloth. Before long, you realise this is a battle standard with powerful magic woven into it. Will you reward the hunter?
